page.title: 14ENTERTAINMENT, STOCKSBRIDGE
page.content: STOCKSBRIDGE HAS A LIBRARY ON MANCHESTER ROAD. THERE IS NO LOCAL NEWSPAPER BUT ARTICLES ARE INCLUDED IN THE 'SOUTH YORKSHIRE TIMES' PRINTED WEEKLY. VIDEOS ARE OBTAINABLE FROM 4 LOCAL SHOPS. THE ENTERTAINMENT REVOLVES ROUND CLUBS, 12 PUBLIC HOUSES AND A SPORTS CENTRE. THERE IS A BINGO HALL IN THE OLD CINEMA ON MANCHESTER ROAD AND NEARBY AN AMUSEMENT CENTRE. THERE IS A LOCAL BAND AND DRAMATIC SOCIETY WHO BOTH PERFORM AT THE 'VICTORY CLUB'. IN THE VILLAGE OF BOLSTERSTONE THERE IS A MALE VOICE CHOIR WHICH HAS GAINED NATIONAL RECOGNITION. DANCES AND DISCOS ARE HELD BOTH AT THE 'INMAN PAVILION' AND YOUTH CENTRE.
